name: Twodee Threedee
description:
Two Dee Three Dee (2d3d) is a small puzzle game made in under half a month. You play as a square man in a grey brick paradise,  using your friend, 2d square man, you traverse the endless test chambers that await you.

CONTROLS :

Alt+f4 or RShift to quit.

The rest is explained in the main menu.

CREDITS:

ME - Everything else :)

VIVIVIVIVI - Background track
